content: [Mn(H2O)2(nbdc)]n1, H2nbdc (0.091 g, 0.50 mmol) and NaOH (0.040 g, 1.0 mmol) were dissolved in deionized H2O (10 mL), nitric acid (2 mol/L) was slowly added to the solution until pH was adjusted to 7, then MnCl2·4H2O (0.099 g, 0.50 mmol) was added. The mixture was filtrated, and the filtrate was left to stand in air. After 2 weeks, brown block crystals (0.036 g, yield 27%) were separated by filtration, washed with deionized water and dried in air. Elemental Analysis: C8H9NO6Mn, found (calc.) C 34.96 (35.57), H 3.29 (3.33), N 5.11 (5.18)%. FTIR (KBr, cm−1): 3487 (m),3353 (s), 3129 (w), 1618 (m), 1559 (vs), 1418 (m), 1380 (vs), 1304 (w), 1237 (w), 951 (w), 840 (m), 774 (s).
clean_text:
Synthesis

[Mn(H2O)2(nbdc)]n1, H2nbdc (0.091 g, 0.50 mmol) and NaOH (0.040 g, 1.0 mmol) were dissolved in deionized H2O (10 mL), nitric acid (2 mol/L) was slowly added to the solution until pH was adjusted to 7, then MnCl2⋅4H2O (0.099 g, 0.50 mmol) was added. The mixture was filtrated, and the filtrate was left to stand in air. After 2 weeks, brown block crystals (0.036 g, yield 27%) were separated by filtration, washed with deionized water and dried in air. Elemental Analysis: C8H9NO6Mn, found (calc.) C 34.96 (35.57), H 3.29 (3.33), N 5.11 (5.18)%. FTIR (KBr, cm-1): 3487 (m),3353 (s), 3129 (w), 1618 (m), 1559 (vs), 1418 (m), 1380 (vs), 1304 (w), 1237 (w), 951 (w), 840 (m), 774 (s).
